name: Nightmare fighter
description:
THIS GAME IS NOT COMPLETE. it works fine, but the gameplay isnt stellar. just try to get a good score its therapeutic ig.  NIGHTMARE FIGHTER is a game about you, waking up in a bad dream, meeting a figment of your imagination and then falling into an endless sleepy snipe and swipe with two demons. w/s to punch, a/d to look right and left respectively, [click] to fire. keep an eye on stamina and ammo. have fun. 

i first started this before the release of drift demons (https://mr-slitherz.itch.io/drift-demons) but left it to die from discouragement. i last left this in the code dumps in december of 2020 and found it when starting a new game. i figured id publish it since i have no idea how to work it, ive forgotten sicnce i origionally started. here it is. this is the same build as the beta i released the day before i quit. 

im currently making a flash style game with paint graphics and bad sfx to commemorate the death of flash. this game tries to resemble the glued together flash games of the early 2000s. its about an orange cat who eats falling burgers from a burger claw. release soon hopefully.
